titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Standard practice guide

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: The standard practice guide was developed "to provide University of Michigan employees with convenient access to the operating policies and practices of the various departments, facilities, and services that are available."
archdesc.scopecontent: The standard practice guide collection includes standard practice bulletins, which were early versions of the guide (ca. 1946-1965), as well as archival versions of the standard practice guide revised to 2005. Archived version of the online Standard Practice Guide are also available in the Bentley Historical Library's digital repository (2007) and the University of Michigan Web Archives (2010-ongoing).
